name: Micro&MacroWars
description:
Two teams fight for domination in this classic Builders and Fighters remake.

Three members of each team focuses on *MACRO*, Constructing Buildings, Units, Researching Abilities and Gathering minerals for their teams *FIGHTER*. One member of each team focuses on *MICRO*, The units and income they receive from other players are used to Destroy the opposing teams Base.
author: _ForgeUser4844532
